name: FarmClicker
description:
1. Description: 

- The game will appeal to fans of the so-called lazy clicker games.

- The game has a crafting system and improvements.

- Earn money to unlock as many animals and crafts as possible.

2. Instructions:

- You need to click on the animals, thereby you will receive raw materials that can be sold or put into production.

-  To buy an animal, you need to swipe to the right and click on the button with the price tag, after the purchase you will be able to improve the animal.

- To put raw materials into production, you initially need to buy craft (a button with a barn).

- You can also automate all processes(the button with the little man) and improve production (the button with the arrow).
